name: Context manager decorator
description: Your task in this kata is to implement simple version of contextlib.contextmanager. The decorator will be used on a generator functions and use the part of function before yield as context manager's "enter section" and the part after the yield as "exit section". If exception occurs inside the context of the with statement, the exception should be passed to the generator via its throw method. Examples: ```python @contextmanager def file_opened(file): fp = open(file) try: yield fp finally: fp.close() with file_opened('a.txt') as fp: print fp.readline() @contextmanager def transaction(connection): connection.begin() try: yield except: connection.rollback() raise else: connection.commit() with transaction(): # ... raise Exception() ``` _Note: contextlib as been forbidden, write your own..._
